page.title: 09A CHILD'S DAY
page.content: Daddy wakes me at 7.30 a.m. all ready for work, his electric calculator inside his briefcase. I dress in my green and red uniform, then downstairs for breakfast of cereal and orange juice. To school in Mummy's mini - school starts at 9.05 a.m. We use the school computer in groups to solve puzzles. Lunchtime is sandwiches for me but my friend has a cooked meal at 12.20 p.m. We use the Adventure Playground and top field in fine weather and go swimming in the heated pool in summer. School ends at 3 p.m. Some children have Beavers or Cubs after school. I am in the Beavers and go swimming at West Wickham and to Disco Dancing. I watch children's T.V. for a long time and my favourite supper is fish and chips. I go to bed at 8 p.m. and read for a while.
